name: Pecharunt
description: The Subjugation Pokémon. It feeds others toxic mochi that draw out desires and capabilities. Those who eat the mochi fall under Pecharunt’s control, chained to its will.

abilities.name: Poison Puppeteer
abilities.description: When this Pokémon inflicts the Poisoned or Badly Poisoned condition, it also inflicts the Charmed condition. Creatures charmed this way may attempt to break from the charm at the end of each of their turns with a CHA save against this Pokémon's CHA DC.
